attributes.title: This app is not meant to be in America
attributes.review: So today I was on this app just to check it out and I came across of some racial slurs like make America great agian where monkeys were in cages behind that racial slur please rake this app down 😌

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I thought this app would be great but it downloaded something else on my phone! Really scary and my phone is way slower. Possible a virus? But please be careful and just don’t download it. NOT WORTH IT!!!

attributes.title: Just Horrible
attributes.review: My experience was horrible would definitely not recommend downloading this app

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: The entire layout of the app is atrocious. This shouldn’t be allowed considering how horrible of an app it is. The news app is way better than this piece of garbage.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!!!!!👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
attributes.review: I bought my brand new iPhone 11 a month ago and I download this app and all of a sudden my phone is flooded with viruses 🦠😤😤. I am infuriated that I have to go back to using my old phone. THIS APP NEEDS TO BE TAKEN DOWN!!!!!🤬😡

attributes.title: THIS APP IS RUN BY THE ALT LEFT DO NOT FALL FOR IT
attributes.review:
This app may appear genuine to sheep, but make no mistake this app is run by the fascist left to collect data from Trump supporters!!!! DO NOT FALL FOR IT!!!!!!!!! They will collect your data and sell it to pedophiles and rapists!!!!!!!!!!!! ITS TIME TO SHUT IT DOWN FOR GOOD!! #TRUMP2020

*For legal purposes, this review is joke.

attributes.title: Ew trump🤢🤮
attributes.review: disgusting worst person on this earth by the way we’re going to war Donald Trump I’m not going down without a fight and I swear to god if you delete the Tiktok ohhhhhh girl you better watch out!!! By the way petition for save Barron Trump.

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: This app is so hard to use and it takes up a lot of space and it is very low quality and it uses a lot of battery 🙄🙄

attributes.title: Bro Fr
attributes.review: So basically, this app is pretty useless and unappealing. Its not easy to navigate I thought itd show progress of our "President" but it doesnt seem to update or show any form of growth or bring any positive feeling

attributes.title: Dissatisfied
attributes.review: I expected to get more informed from this app on what’s going on but it’s useless. I only used the app for 5 minutes and it went blank I’m soooo disappointed🤬
